thread.title: Well Established Ecommerce Biz In Auto Parts Niche
thread.title_full: Well Established Ecommerce Biz In Auto Parts Niche

title: Well Established Ecommerce Biz In Auto Parts Niche
text: Questions Business Summary The automotive niche is huge with the number of vehicles on the road in the US reaching a record level of almost 253 million, an increase of more than 3.7 million since last year. This listing is a 19 year old company specializing in wheel accessories. With thousands of products always in stock, there is something for every need and budget! The current owner started the company from the ground up beginning with a Brick and Mortar retailer/wholesaler store and later evolving to its current incarnation as an online merchant. The customer base is made up of a varied demographic with 85-90% being general consumers searching for a replacement hubcap and 10-15% being auto related businesses like tire stores and used car lots. Most sales are made via the main website with about 10% of sales attained via an eBay Store. 95% of products are in-stock at their warehouse location and 5% are dropped shipped from the supplier. The product orders are roughly split between the sale of re-conditioned hubcaps and new hubcap & wheel accessories. The website is successfully operated by one owner, five full time employees and one part time employee that handle the day to day operations. The business currently utilizes 12,500 Sq Ft of a 17,500 Sq Ft warehouse which houses the company's entire operation and from which the business is run. The current inventory value is about $500k with FF&E estimated at $80k. This business has an extensive history with almost 10 years online. Through experience and longevity in this industry, the company has fine-tuned operations to be streamlined and has produced double digit growth year over year. With Sales up 16% for Jan-July 2015 over the same period in 2014, sales are estimated to reach around $1.9M for 2015. It is an outstanding business opportunity for an eligible buyer looking to acquire a profitable, efficiently run ecommerce business in the automotive niche with lots of room to grow! Financials
